concept.title: CMM support for increasing improving CDRs FT test suite (Feature f52047-03)
concept.shortdesc: This feature reviews and enhances the CDR FT test suite.

conbody.p: This feature increases the scope of testing in file management of the charging files, tariff functionality, which was tested in the Ga interface only. Charging file functionality to overwrite a fully but not transferred charging file is also tested.
The following alarms are updated regarding severity and threshold value:
Moreover, testing now contains cases where the control files of charging are deactivated (TT control files) and charging file compression is tested as well.
